0010001000110011 0011110011111100 1 -> sum: 0101111100110000, cout: 0

1100001110001011 1000001000110110 1 -> sum: 0100010111000010, cout: 1
1000100010100000 0001001100101101 1 -> sum: 1001101111001110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
